EmailTemplate.name: MMAdClientApprovalNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: AD {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is approved by Client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.OwnerFirstName},
The AD {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is approved by Client The AD is now ready for publication.
Sincerely, ADvendio Team
